thread.title: Hale and hearty: Farida Jalal in shock over death rumours
thread.title_full: Hale and hearty: Farida Jalal in shock over death rumours

author: Entertainment Desk
title: Hale and hearty: Farida Jalal in shock over death rumours
text:
Share Tweet Email Bollywood actor, Farida Jalal. PHOTO: MID-DAY 
Latest victim of baseless gossip, veteran Bollywood actor, Farida Jalal was rumoured to have passed away last night. 
While many were shocked over her sudden ‘demise’, the news could not be confirmed. However, turns out it was all a faux! Fortunately, the Dilwale Dulhaniya Le Jayengay actor is hale and hearty, and she said so herself! 
Unexpected: Alive and kicking 
According to a report in DNA , Farida slammed the rumours about her death and said, “I am hale and hearty.” 
She further added, “I don’t know from where these baseless rumours are coming from. Initially I laughed, but from last 30 minutes my phone have been constantly ringing and everybody is asking the same question. It’s a bit irritating, I wonder why people spread such rumours.” 
Previously Amitabh Bachchan, Yo Yo Honey Sing, Dilip Kumar were also victims of death hoax. 
Obviously, once Farida’s statement was released, Twitter exploded. 
I'm really glad my Favourite Actress is within us. #FaridaJalal Don't believe in Fake News and stop spreading it across. 
— Duheeta Joshi (@Duheeta2) February 20, 2017 Even the breathing person can be made dead with millions following it.That's social media for you #FaridaJalal 
— Ishan Bajpai (@isbajpai) February 20, 2017 Actress @FaridaJalal__ dead? Not true! Yet another death hoax rocks Bollywood!The REAL News is that FARIDA JALAL is NOT DEAD! #FaridaJalal pic.twitter.com/jkl27Q4hiZ
